T02n2918u_001:10: tatra vaibhāṣikasthityā śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ ca vyākhyāyate |
T02n2918u_001:17: evaṃ mādhy- amiko'pi māyopamādva-yavādi-sarvadharmāpratiṣṭhānavādi bhedāt dvi- vidhaḥ |
T02n2918u_001:25: tad uktam- (p1) asti khalv iti nīlādi jagad iti jaḍīyase |
T02n2918u_001:27: (3) asti pudgalo- “bhāravāho ṇa ṇiccaṃ bhaṇāmi ṇāṇiccam bhaṇāmī“ ti,
T02n2918u_001:28: pu- dgalaś ca rāgavān saṃsaratīti rāgaprahāṇāyāśudhā bhāvanā dhyānam |
T02n2918u_001:30: tad uktam- imaṃ carmapuṭaṃ tāvat svabuddhau ca pṛthakkuru |
T02n2918u_001:32: (4) asthīny api pṛthakkṛtvā paśya majjānam antataḥ |
T02n2918u_001:33: kim atra sāram astīti svayam eva vicāraya ||
T02n2918u_001:36: yāvaj jīvaṃ buddhaṃ dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi,
T02n2918u_001:37: kiṃ punar vandyau su- gatau'tha buddhau,
T02n2918u_001:38: yāvat kuśalamūlaṃ tam ekam ātmānaṃ damayiṣyāmy eka atmānaṃ śamayiṣyāmy ekam ātamānaṃ parinirvāpayi- ṣyāmīti dṛṣṭiḥ |
T02n2918u_001:43: III. śrāvaka-adhimātrasya bāhyārthāṅgīkāriṇaḥ śarīrasya nairātmya- tāvyavasthāpanaṃ vivṛtiḥ |
T02n2918u_001:51: IV. atra ca mṛduśrāvako niyatagotratvād akāruṇikatvāt śākyabuddha evety eke |
T02n2918u_001:52: anye tu- (p2) sarve buddhā bhaviṣyanti nābhavyo bhuvi vidyate |
T02n2918u_001:55: niyatagotraṃ tu kiñcit buddham apekṣata iti manyate |
T02n2918u_001:61: tatra indriyān nirodho vipaśyanā pudgalasyānupalabdhiḥ kāyavākcetasāṃ saṃyamaḥ śamathaḥ |
T02n2918u_001:66: tad uktam- anāgatāyāṃ nidrāyāṃ pranaṣṭe bāhyagocare |
T02n2918u_001:67: yā bhaven manaso'vasthā bhāvayet tāṃ prayatnataḥ ||
T02n2918u_001:70: tad āhuḥ nāgārjunapādāḥ- ajānānaṃ hi prajñānaṃ nidrādṛṣṭāntasādhitam |
T02n2918u_001:72: (8) bhagavataḥ pravacanam api- varaṃ jetavane ramye śṛgālatvaṃ vrajāmy aham |
T02n2918u_001:73: na tu vaiśeṣikaṃ mokṣaṃ gotvam āgantum arhati ||
T02n2918u_001:78: duḥ- khaduḥkhatā-vipariṇāmaduḥkhatābhyām ahanyahani sattvān ālambya yā karuṇotpadyate sā sattvāvalambanā |
T02n2918u_001:79: śrāvakasya deśanā vācakī pratyekabu- ddhasya tu kāyikī |
T02n2918u_001:80: tad uktam- (p3) sambuddhānām anutpāde śrāvakānāṃ punaḥ kṣaye |
T02n2918u_001:86: tasya ceyam eva pratyavekṣaṇā yad uta sākārajñānajanakatvaṃ nāma |
T02n2918u_001:87: tad āhuḥ- bhinnakālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyam iti ced grāhyatāṃ viduḥ |
T02n2918u_001:91: tad uktam abhyāsasyeyaṃ kalanā yat kālaḥ saṃkhyā kriyāyāḥ |
T02n2918u_001:93: paricayaś ca- cittaṃ niścitya bodhena abhyāsaṃ kurute yadā |
T02n2918u_001:94: tadā cittaṃ na paśyāmi kva gataṃ sthitaṃ bhavet ||
T02n2918u_001:98: tritayānupalabdhyā prajñāpāramitāsva- bhāvena pañcapāramitācaraṇaṃ phalavaimukhyena sattvārthapariṇāmanā tad dṛṣṭir iti |
T02n2918u_001:100: tatra sākārāravijñānavādī “ṣaṭkena yugapad yo- gāt paramāṇoḥ ṣaḍaṅgate“ ty ādinā nyāyena paramāṇūnām apy anupapat- teḥ |
T02n2918u_001:101: cittamātram evedaṃ cittākāradhāri grāhyagrāhakabhāvavinirmuktaṃ prakāśaṃ prakāśata iti pratipannavān |
T02n2918u_001:102: tad uktaṃ cittamātraṃ bho jina- putrā ! yad uta traidhātukam iti |
T02n2918u_001:103: tathā cāhuḥ kīrtipādāḥ- dhiyo nīlādirūpatve bāhyo'rthaḥ kiṃnibandhanaḥ |
T02n2918u_001:109: (15) tasmāt cittam eva citrākāraṃ paraṃ nirapekṣaprakāśyaṃ prakāśata iti sākāravijñānavādiyogācārasya vivṛtiḥ |
T02n2918u_001:110: nirākāravādiyogācaras tu cittam eva idam anākārasvasamvedanarūpaṃ iti manyate |
T02n2918u_001:111: tad uktam- bhāhye na vidyate hy artho yathā bālair vikalpyate |
T02n2918u_001:113: (16) yāvad ābhāsate yac ca tan māyaiva ca bhāsate |
T02n2918u_001:119: tad uktam- yatra yatra mano yāti jñeye tatraiva yojayet |
T02n2918u_001:120: calitvā yāsyate kutra sarvam eva hi tanmayam ||
T02n2918u_001:123: tathā ca- rūpam asya mataṃ svacchaṃ nirākāraṃ nirañjanam |
T02n2918u_001:124: śakyaṃ tena na hi jñātum abuddhena kadācana ||
T02n2918u_001:125: (20) vijñaptimātram evadam ity api hy upalambhataḥ |
T02n2918u_001:127: (21) yadā tv ālambanaṃ jñānaṃ naivopalabhate tadā |
T02n2918u_001:132: tathā coktam- yad yad vai dṛśyate kiñcit tat tat brahmeti kalpayet |
T02n2918u_001:137: bodhāmbhodhau mayi svacchaṃ tac chāyam viśvabuddhayaḥ |
T02n2918u_001:138: udito vā pralīno vā na vikalpāya kalpate ||
T02n2918u_001:142: tatra māyopamādvayavādinaḥ vivṛtiḥ- na san nāsan na sadasan na cāpy anubhayātmakam |
T02n2918u_001:147: tathā doṣād dvandvāt ubhayam api na,
T02n2918u_001:149: api ca pūrvetaraparāmarśāt- mūrtiś citre yathāvastuśakti- - skavāsaṅgaḥ (?) ! (26)
T02n2918u_001:155: sarvadharmāpratiṣṭhānavādi- nāṃ tv ayaṃ vicāraḥ- na matam śāśvataṃ viśvaṃ na cocchedisamīhitam |
T02n2918u_001:158: athaiṣā kalpanā naiva yac cid vetti na cittatām ||
T02n2918u_001:159: (28) yo vit sarvasamāropaḥ sa sarvaḥ sarvathā na hi |
T02n2918u_001:161: (29) anābhogaṃ hi yad jñānaṃ tac cāintyaṃ pracakṣate |
T02n2918u_001:162: sañcinti yad acintyaṃ vai tad acintyaṃ bhaven na hi ||
T02n2918u_001:163: (30) yenājātaṃ jagad buddhaṃ buddhiḥ śuddhaiva bodhataḥ |
T02n2918u_001:164: nijaṃ tasya jagat satyam anābhogena dhīmataḥ ||
T02n2918u_001:165: (31) tad uktam- sarvāropavinirmukte svatas tattve cakāsati |
T02n2918u_001:167: (32) asya ca vicārāya āyātasya arthasya anāroparūpasya anabhiniveśavihāreṇa sākṣātkriyā dhyānaṃ |
T02n2918u_001:171: dharmāvalam- banā cānityatāvyasanasampātinaḥ sarvadharmān ālambya utpadyate yā sā boddhavyā |
T02n2918u_001:172: abhimātrasya ca ālambananiḥsvabhāvā manaskāradharmā- dhigamānālambanā karuṇā |
T02n2918u_001:174: tathā ca- karoti yena citrāṇi hitāni jagataḥ samam |
T02n2918u_001:175: ā bhavāt so'nupacchannaḥ kāyo nairmāṇiko muneḥ ||
T02n2918u_001:178: (34) sarvākārāṃ viśuddhiṃ ye dharmāḥ prāptā nirāsravāḥ |
T02n2918u_001:182: mantranayas tu asmābhir ihātigambhīratvād gambhīranayādhimuktika- puruṣaviṣayatvāt caturmudrādisādhanaprakāśanavistaratvāc ca na vyāk- riyate
T02n2918u_001:183: tathā ca- (7) ekārthatve'py asaṃmohāt bahūpāyād aduṣkarāt |
T02n2918u_001:185: (36) kṛtaś cāsmābhir atra sekanirṇayo nāma granthaḥ |
T02n2918u_001:186: (avasānaṃ) nanu yadi mahāyānanirṇīta evārthaḥ paramārtho'sti atra kim arthaṃ tarhi śrāvakapratyekabuddhayāne bhagavān deśitavān,
T02n2918u_001:190: upāyas tv ayaṃ sambuddhaiḥ sopānam iva nirmitaḥ ||
T02n2918u_001:191: (37) saddharmapuṇḍarīke'py uktam- ekaṃ tu yānaṃ hi nayaś ca eka ekā ciyaṃ deśana nāyakānāṃ |
T02n2918u_001:192: upāyakauśalya mamaivarūpaṃ yat trīṇi yānāny upadarśayāmi ||
T02n2918u_001:193: (38) nāgārjunapādair apy uktam- dharmadhātor asaṃbhedād dhyānabhedo'sti na prabho |
T02n2918u_001:195: (39) anyatrāpy uktam- muktis tu śūnyatādṛṣṭis tadarthāśeṣabhāvaṇā |
T02n2918u_001:197: idaṃ ca yānatritayaprakāśanaṃ manyamānaśūnyatā saiva bhagavato 'vagantavyaḥ |
T02n2918u_001:198: tathāhi- nodāhṛtaṃ tvayā kiñcid ekam apy akṣaraṃ vibho |
T02n2918u_001:204: (43) yānānāṃ nāsti vai niṣṭhā yāvac cittaṃ pravartate |
T02n2918u_001:205: (8) parāvṛtte tu vai citte na yānaṃ nāpi yāyinaḥ ||
T02n2918u_001:210: (46) vidhāya bhavyārthanāyaprayatnād imaṃ mayā grantham anuttarā- rtham |
T02n2918u_001:211: ālambhi yat puṇyam anena lokas tathāgatatvaṃ labhatām alabhyam ||
